casebody.data:
Peter BUFFA and wife, Stacy Buffa, Plaintiffs,
v.
CYGNATURE CONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT, INC. ; Granite Hardwoods, Inc.; The Hardwood Company; Windsor Window Company d/b/a Windsor Windows and Doors; Christopher Wotell; and Gary Sovel, Defendants. No. COA16-237 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 30, 2016

AFFIRMED IN PART; REVERSED AND REMANDED IN PART.
